# CORDIC_trigonometric_hyperbolic_library
Efficient c-library of trigonometric, and hyperbolic functions based on CORDIC algorithm

# Compilation, and test
<pre><code>$ gcc -o cordic cordic.c -lm
$ ./cordic </code></pre>

# Output
